ComicInfo.Title: Oh, Darius Dread, You Kill Me!
ComicInfo.Summary: The Intrepids are sent to track down Dante’s nemesis, the nefarious Dr. Koi. A key source of information is Darius Dread, a mercenary once employed by Koi, who is a surprisingly resourceful adversary. His use of battle baboons: unconventional. But Darius Dread isn’t all that he seems.
